import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Table, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getInvoiceById } from "./InvoiceService"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; class InvoiceViewer extends Component { state = {}; subTotalCost = 0; componentDidMount() { getInvoiceById(this.props.match.params.id).then(res => { this.setState({ ...res.data }); }); } render() { this.subTotalCost = 0; let { orderNo, buyer, seller, item: invoiceItemList = [], status, vat, date } = this.state; return (

Order Info

#{orderNo}

Order status: {status}

Order date: {date ? format(new Date(date).getTime(), "MMMM dd, yyyy") : ""}

Bill From

{seller ? seller.name : null}

{seller ? seller.address : null}
Bill To

{buyer ? buyer.name : null}

{buyer ? buyer.address : null}
{invoiceItemList.map((item, index) => { this.subTotalCost += item.unit * item.price; return ( ); })}
# Item Name Unit Price Unit Cost
{index + 1} {item.name} {item.price} {item.unit} {item.unit * item.price}

Sub total: ${this.subTotalCost}

Vat(%): {vat}

Grand Total: ${(this.subTotalCost += (this.subTotalCost * vat) / 100)}
); } } export default withRouter(InvoiceViewer);
